name: Altum (Choppers)
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare's Compo in 2 days.

Theme: Deeper and Deeper

Use the mouse to move around the space surrounding your de-powered ship. Attach your grapple to asteroids with left click and left click again to pull yourself towards them.  Collect enough energy from asteroids that you reel in with right click, return to your ship and escape the black hole of which you are falling deeper and deeper into.

Be careful when collecting asteroids, as it is easy to leave yourself stranded!

Assets created using the pallet from: https://lospec.com/palette-list/red-is-dead

Fun fact; This game became corrupted halfway through the jam, and I had no backup.
